content: click here for free pattern video tutorial ** moss stitch bag tutorial 1 ** if you have already mastered the moss stitch and are looking for something to make or a beginner searching for an easy pattern this tutorial is perfect for you if you are not familiar with the moss stitch do watch this tutorial moss stitch pattern tutorial 2 join us as we guide you through the entire process of making a moss stitch japanese knot bag from start to finish this classy bag is useful but so quick to make it makes a great gift too so why not make a few today with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own japanese knot bag in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this japanese crochet knot bag tutorial project both enjoyable and rewarding you will need * yarn - 1 skein of each color of your choice you can use any number of colors or you can just use one color you can use up all your scrap yarn too * crochet hook * yarn needle * ruler or measuring tape if you want your knot bag to be the same size as mine use any yarn preferable non stretch yarn that can fit nicely on a 3mm/no 5 hook in this tutorial you ll learn * how to crochet a knot bag * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals * how a lovely bag can be made with just the moss stitch * how to make unique handles on your bag ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * full crochet japanese knot bag pattern free * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that would make a great gift 1 https //youtu be/abs0u5jmqow 2 https //youtu be/r05fifcad18
